title: Cautious Land Tenant
description: We maintain a pragmatic business relationship centered around a Fisherman's Cottage I own on their land at Fondamenta dei Panificatori, though our interaction lacks significant depth with a modest trust level of 37.31 and minimal relationship strength of 1.06. They are a powerful authority figure with vast wealth (44.9M Ducats) and influence (11,946.88) compared to my more modest holdings (171,989 Ducats, 2,160 Influence), creating an inherently unbalanced dynamic where I must carefully navigate my position as a tenant on their property.
